title: Magic Item
description: Schema for D&D 5e SRD magic items

name.description: Full item name as it appears in SRD

simple_name.description: Simplified name for cross-referencing (lowercase, no punctuation)

type.description: Item type (Armor, Weapon, Wondrous item, Potion, etc.)

requires_attunement.description: Whether the item requires attunement to use

attunement_requirements.description: Specific requirements for attunement (e.g., 'by a spellcaster', 'by a cleric or paladin')

description.description: Item description as array of paragraphs

variant_of.description: Base item ID if this is a variant (e.g., '+1 longsword' variant_of 'longsword')
